alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jackson; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clarke, east central Jackson, northwestern Oglethorpe and southwestern Madison Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Danielsville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Danielsville, Nicholson, Comer, Winterville, Colbert, Ila, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Diamond Hill, Smithonia, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Barretts Mill, Dunlap and Neese. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
